body: Half the time, my upvote doesn't change the number beside the post/comment. Why?
body_html: Half the time, my upvote doesn't change the number beside the post/comment. Why?
title: Why do some of my upvotes do nothing?

body: I've found that voting doesn't work until the page has finished loading.
body_html: I've found that voting doesn't work until the page has finished loading.

body: When i hit the upvote button on a post while scrolling there is like a 50% chance it will work thus making upvoting harder to do here.
body_html: When i hit the upvote button on a post while scrolling there is like a 50% chance it will work thus making upvoting harder to do here.

author.bio:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.
author.bio_html:
Goodbye. https://ruqqus.com/+The_Cabal/post/d9y9/i-told-you-so-all-the

Remember: History repeats, and the unaware are doomed to repeat it.

body: The official explanation given by @captainmeta4 is that Ruqqus does not have live upvote scores, instead it recalculates them periodically. So your votes count, but it won't be visible in the total score until the score on that post/comment is recalculated again.
body_html: The official explanation given by @captainmeta4 is that Ruqqus does not have live upvote scores, instead it recalculates them periodically. So your votes count, but it won't be visible in the total score until the score on that post/comment is recalculated again.

body: Often the page loads some things in the background that take a lot longer than the actual content, but you can't vote, comment, or click any buttons until everything is fully loaded. So you have to sit and stare at the page for a few minutes before you can interact with it. I don't believe this started happening until a few weeks ago.
body_html: Often the page loads some things in the background that take a lot longer than the actual content, but you can't vote, comment, or click any buttons until everything is fully loaded. So you have to sit and stare at the page for a few minutes before you can interact with it. I don't believe this started happening until a few weeks ago.
